Uses of Class
edu.concordia.app.model.PlayGame

  • Packages that use PlayGame 
    Package Description
    edu.concordia.app.model  

    • Uses of PlayGame in edu.concordia.app.model

      Subclasses of PlayGame in edu.concordia.app.model 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NCardGamePlay
      This class creates an instance for the strategy where the game will end as soon as each player has placed N Lake Tiles on the board (where the value of N is chosen by the user, and must be at least 2 and at most M, where M is the number of Lake Tiles in the original draw stack divided by the number of players)
      class  NHonorPointsGamePlay
      This class creates an instance for the strategy where the game will end as soon as any one player has made enough dedications to earn N Honor points (where the value of N is chosen by the user, and must be at least 4 and at most M, where M is the sum of the values of all Dedication Tokens in the game divided by the number of players)
      class  NormalGamePlay
      This class creates an instance for the strategy where the game will end as it did in Build 2 (i.e., exactly as described in the rule book).
      Methods in edu.concordia.app.model that return PlayGame 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlayGame GameInstance.getGameEndMode() 
      Methods in edu.concordia.app.model with parameters of type PlayGame 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameInstance.setGameEndMode(PlayGame gameEndMode)
